Text saved: Asteroids are rocks in space. Some asteroids are dangerous. They are dangerous because they can come very close to Earth. This is less than 7.5 million kilometres away. NASA made a map of 1,400 of these asteroids. But NASA thinks none of them are a danger for the next 100 years. NASA has technology to watch these objects. So they can know if an asteroid will hit Earth. Then, NASA can use two ways to keep us safe.
